Music

Albums | EPs | Singles | Boxsets | Mixes | Playlists

ALBUMS
Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez

Release date: 23rd October 2020

Formats: Digital / CD / 12″ Vinyl / 12″ Vinyl (Blue) / 12″ Vinyl (Yellow) / 12″ Vinyl (Orange) / 12″ Vinyl (Recycled) / 7″ Vinyl (Various Colours) / Cassette

The seventh studio album.

Tracklist:

Strange Timez [feat. Robert Smith]
The Valley of The Pagans [feat. Beck]
The Lost Chord [feat. Leee John]
PAC-MAN [feat. ScHoolboy Q]
Chalk Tablet Towers [feat. St. Vincent]
The Pink Phantom [feat. Elton John & 6LACK]
Aries [feat. Peter Hook & Georgia]
Friday 13th [feat. Octavian]
Dead Butterflies [feat. Kano & Roxani Arias]
Désolé (Extended Version) [feat. Fatoumata Diawara]
Momentary Bliss [feat. slowthai & Slaves]
EPs
Song Machine

Release dates: 30th January – 24th December 2020

Formats: Digital

These EPs were released as a series consisting of singles, remixes & conversations referred to as Machine Bitez.

Meanwhile…

Release date: 26th August 2021

Formats: Digital / 12″ Vinyl

Where to listen: gorill.az/meanwhile

Tracklist:

Meanwhile [feat. Jelani Blackman & Barrington Levy]
Jimmy Jimmy [feat. AJ Tracey]
Déjà Vu (Live from NW10) [feat. Alicai Harley]
SINGLES
Song Machine Theme Tune

Release date: 28th January 2020

Formats: Digital

A non-album single. The song was originally 23 seconds, but later extended to 30 via an update.

Momentary Bliss [feat. slowthai & Slaves]

Release date: 30th January 2020

Formats: Digital

The first single from Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez & the only single from Song Machine Episode 1.

Désolé [feat. Fatoumata Diawara]

Release date: 27th February 2020

Formats: Digital

The second single from Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez & the only single from Song Machine Episode 2.

Aries [feat. Peter Hook & Georgia]

Release date: 9th April 2020

Formats: Digital

The third single from Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez & the only single from Song Machine Episode 3.

How Far? [feat. Tony Allen & Skepta]

Release date: 2nd May 2020

Formats: Digital

Where to listen: https://gorillaz.lnk.to/HowFar?

The fourth single from Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez (Deluxe Edition); released in memory of Tony Allen.

Friday 13th [feat. Octavian]

Release date: 9th June 2020

Formats: Digital

The fifth single from Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez & the only single from Song Machine Episode 4.

PAC-MAN [feat. ScHoolboy Q]

Release date: 20th July 2020

Formats: Digital

The sixth single from Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez & the only single from Song Machine Episode 5; released to celebrate Pac-Man’s 40th anniversary.

Strange Timez [feat. Robert Smith]

Release date: 9th September 2020

Formats: Digital

The seventh single from Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez & the only single from Song Machine Episode 6.

The Pink Phantom [feat. Elton John & 6LACK]

Release date: 1st October 2020

Formats: Digital

The eighth single from Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez & the only single from Song Machine Episode 7.

The Valley of The Pagans [feat. Beck]

Release date: 5th November 2020

Formats: Digital

The ninth single from Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez & the only single from Song Machine Episode 8.

The Lost Chord [feat. Leee John]

Release date: 24th December 2020

Formats: Digital

The tenth and final single from Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez.

BOXSETS
G Collection: The Studio Albums

Release date: 17th July 2021

Formats: 12″ Vinyl

This was released for Record Store Day 2021 and limited to 980 copies.

Albums:

Gorillaz
Demon Days
Plastic Beach
Humanz (Standard Edition)
The Now Now (Standard Edition)
Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez (Standard Edition)
MIXES
The Machine Is On!! A Song Machine Mix by Noodle

Release date: 15th October 2020

Formats: Digital

This was made to promote Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez (Noodle Edition).

Song Machine Made by 2D From Gorillaz

Release date: 16th October 2020

Formats: Digital

This was made to promote Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez (2D Edition).

Russel Hobbs Presents a Flamin’ Hot Song Machine Mix

Release date: 17th October 2020

Formats: Digital

This was made to promote Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez (Russel Edition).

Mud’z Massive Machine Mix

Release date: 18th October 2020

Formats: Digital

This was made to promote Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez (Murdoc Edition).

Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez (Gorillaz 20 Mix)

Release date: 23rd October 2021

Formats: Digital

Where to listen: https://music.apple.com/gb/album/song-machine-season-one-strange-timez-gorillaz-20-mix/1590927007

PLAYLISTS
Wish You Were Here

Release date: 11th October 2019

A replacement to Maydeup Festival that also saw four playlists (one per band member) released simultaneously; it was later replaced with G-Mix: 11.

Night Terrors! (A Playlist Curated by Murdoc Niccals)

Release date: 31st October 2019

A replacement to Wish You Were Here, Murdoc!; it was later replaced with Murdoc’s Sleighlist.

Tracklist:

Gorillaz – Murdoc Is God
The Fall – There’s a Ghost in My House
Bauhaus – Bela Lugosi’s Dead
Santo & Johnny – Sleep Walk

Murdoc’s Sleighlist (A Playlist Curated by Murdoc Niccals)

Release date: 20th December 2019

A replacement to Night Terrors!; it was later replaced with G-Mix: Murdoc Niccals 11.

Release dates: 21st February 2020 – 27th January 2022

A return to the G-Mix series that replaced Wish You Were Here.
